author: Staff Reporter
text:
In view of the inauguration of Regional Centres of Tamil Nadu State Judicial Academy at Coimbatore and Madurai scheduled on February 21, the Registrar General of the Madras High Court has sanctioned the post of Deputy Director in the two Centres.

Through a notification dated February 12, A.K. Mehbub Alikhan, Senior Civil Judge functioning as Judicial Officer/ Chairman, Taxation Appeals Tribunal, Corporation of Tirunelveli is transferred and posted as Deputy Director, for the Regional Centre at Madurai.

Similarly, P. Srikumar, Senior Civil Judge functioning as Judicial Officer/ Chairman, Taxation Appeals Tribunal, Corporation of Tirupur is transferred and posted as Deputy Director for Regional Centre at Coimbatore.
title: Judicial academies get deputy directors
